document_data.name: ''Cegilune's Perfume''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cegilune's Perfume''''' was a unique magic [[ring]] that bore the name of the goddess mother of [[hag]]s, [[Cegilune]], part of the ''Fading Rings'' set.
document_data.Powers: This crude-looking, faintly glowing ring gave the wearer the power to cast the ''[[repulsion]]'' spell at its full strength in exchange for reducing the user's charisma.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Cegilune's Perfume'' came to be possessed by a mysterious monument, ''the Great Stone Head'', located in the [[Nightingale Court]] in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. In exchange for one of the ''[[eidolon]]s'', small totem statues depicting various gods, the monument dispensed powerful magic rings, one being the ''Cegilune's Perfume''.
